item.title: Who am I?
item.author: mtganalyze@gmail.com (Felix Weidemann)
item.description: It’s the sixth week of my paternity leave. I recently became a twin dad in addition to being just a dad. Being off work and spending hours changing diapers and holding a baby or two offers a lot of time to think about stuff. Since I am a passionate Magic player and I haven’t been touching cards in the last few weeks I found myself to be thinking about Magic a lot.
